description: Hibs Colts edge through on penalties
title: Hibs Colts edge through on penalties
title_page: Hibs Colts edge through on penalties - BBC Sport
maintext:
Hibernian B squeezed through on penalties against Highland League side Formartine United in the first round north of the SPFL Trust Trophy.
Forward Daniel Park gave the visitors the lead three minutes from the break, but Hibs striker Josh Landers replied in first-half stoppage time.
There were no more goals, with Hibs' colts progressing after winning the shoot-out 4-2 to set up a visit to Highland League champions Brechin City on 15/16 August.
